# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(sourcesharp LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_library(sourcesharp SHARED "")
set_target_properties(sourcesharp PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "sourcesharp")
set_target_properties(sourcesharp PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x86/release")
set_target_properties(sourcesharp PROPERTIES ARCHIVE_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x86/release")
target_include_directories(sourcesharp PRIVATE
    src
    include
    D:/SourceSharp/runtime/Core/bin/x86/Release/net7.0/win-x86
    D:/source/metamod-source/core
    D:/source/metamod-source/core/sourcehook
    D:/source/hl2sdk-csgo/public
    D:/source/hl2sdk-csgo/public/engine
    D:/source/hl2sdk-csgo/public/mathlib
    D:/source/hl2sdk-csgo/public/vstdlib
    D:/source/hl2sdk-csgo/public/tier0
    D:/source/hl2sdk-csgo/public/tier1
    D:/source/hl2sdk-csgo/public/game/server
    D:/source/hl2sdk-csgo/public/toolframework
    D:/source/hl2sdk-csgo/game/shared
    D:/source/hl2sdk-csgo/common
)
target_compile_definitions(sourcesharp PRIVATE
    _CRT_SECURE_NO_DEPRECATE
    _CRT_SECURE_NO_WARNINGS
    _CRT_NONSTDC_NO_DEPRECATE
    _ITERATOR_DEBUG_LEVEL=0
    WIN32
    _WINDOWS
    SOURCE_ENGINE=21
    COMPILER_MSVC
    COMPILER_MSVC32
    NETWORK_VARS_ENABLED
)
target_compile_options(sourcesharp PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/MT>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/W3>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/Oy->
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/EHsc>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/GR->
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/TP>
)
if(CMAKE_CXX_COMPILER_FRONTEND_VARIANT STREQUAL "MSVC")
    target_compile_options(sourcesharp PRIVATE /EHsc)
else()
    target_compile_options(sourcesharp PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET sourcesharp PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(sourcesharp PRIVATE
    SourceSharp.Runtime
    tier0
    tier1
    vstdlib
    mathlib
    interfaces
    legacy_stdio_definitions
)
target_link_directories(sourcesharp PRIVATE
    D:/SourceSharp/runtime/Core/bin/x86/Release/net7.0/win-x86
    D:/source/hl2sdk-csgo/lib/public
)
target_link_options(sourcesharp PRIVATE
    /MACHINE:X86
    kernel32.lib
    user32.lib
    gdi32.lib
    winspool.lib
    comdlg32.lib
    advapi32.lib
    shell32.lib
    ole32.lib
    oleaut32.lib
    uuid.lib
    odbc32.lib
    odbccp32.lib
)
target_sources(sourcesharp PRIVATE
    src/engine.cpp
    src/sourcesharp.cpp
)
